channel.title: Posts on Natalie Chin
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Natalie Chin

item.title: Giving Back
item.description: In many ways, 2018 to 2019 was my defining - first, full real experience in the real world. I was incredibly lucky to have found out about blockchain early on, while I was still in school - and to find something that I’m really passionate about. I have been to countless hackathons, meetup events and a variety of workshop events to talk about Introduction to Blockchain, Overcoming Imposter Syndrome and overall, have been giving back.

item.title: Looking Forward Moving Back
item.description: This is a part of a previous series that I started while at STK to honour females in tech.

item.title: Girls Don't Understand Computers
item.description: There will always be people in the world who try to bring you down. It’s about who’s there to help you get back up, and how you keep going that matters.

item.title: Automated Eth Wrapping
item.description: How to make a contract auto wrap and unwrap ETH

item.title: Smart Contract Security
item.description: Storing your cryptocurrency in a private wallet vs a smart contract wallet
